function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited adoption of contact tracing apps","Impact":"Incomplete data for tracing potential contacts","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, incentives for app usage","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, behavioral incentives, data privacy measures","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing","Impact":"Decreased willingness to use contact tracing apps","Mitigation":"Transparent privacy policies, encryption, data anonymization","Technologies":"Encryption technology, data anonymization tools, privacy-protecting algorithms","People":"General population","Owner":"Tech companies, government authorities"},{"Description":"Reliability of contact tracing data","Impact":"Inaccurate or missing data for tracing potential contacts","Mitigation":"Continuous improvement of app functionality, data verification processes","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, app updates, data quality control measures","People":"Public health authorities, app developers","Owner":"Public health authorities, tech companies"}]}
